originalText.text: the company offers marvelous service in cleaning carpets. Gerald came to our house courteously and cleaned up the mess on the carpet. He is also amenable and an expert on his job. Two thumbs up for his service!

originalText.text: Very impressive, respectable, and competent organization. I heartily endorse them. Mark

text.text: Very impressive, respectable, and competent organization. I heartily endorse them. Mark

originalText.text: Their work is wonderful. They are GREAT! They were fair, quick, honest, and did a terrific job. I will never ever use another service as I am sold on this team and their work. They cleaned the carpets really well  for us and two chairs. Really loved their work. I highly recommend.

text.text: Their work is wonderful. They are GREAT! They were fair, quick, honest, and did a terrific job. I will never ever use another service as I am sold on this team and their work. They cleaned the carpets really well  for us and two chairs. Really loved their work. I highly recommend.

originalText.text: They took my rugs to clean. Told me they would be ready in two or three weeks. Two months later the rugs were still not cleaned or returned. Worse than this, they lied to us. Repeatedly. Three times they told us the rugs were "on the truck" and would be delivered back on a certain day and time. We waited at home at the times we were told they would arrive. The rugs did not come. It's a pandemic. I would have understood if they were just backed-up and simply told us that, apologized, treated us respectfully, gave us honest answers about when we could expect to get the rugs back. Instead they unflinchingly lied, deflected, wasted our time and made false promises. In the end, they dumped the rugs - still uncleaned - on the floor in the lobby of my building (rather than delivering them to the apartment). They haven't yet returned the money I paid them up front for cleaning.

originalText.text: The team were amazing! I had some water damage due to they were sympathetic and very easy to work with! the team worked around my schedule and came out to my condo quickly. The job was done very well - highly recommend them!
